name: OP.GG Inc.
description: Operator of an e-gaming data analytics company intended to build a better gaming ecosystem for all gamers. The company's platform creates profiles for gamers by analyzing game data from the games they play and can improve their gameplay and see the game performance of their opponents and friends, providing players with the necessary insight into the games to improve their gaming performance.
one_liner: Operator of an e-gaming data analytics company intended to build a better gaming ecosystem for all gamers. The company's platform creates profiles for gamers by analyzing game data from the games they play and can improve their gameplay and see the game performance of their opponents and friends, providing players with the necessary insight into the games to improve their gaming performance.
